column5: Any comments on the Deerhorn Lodge, SK. It's a flyin from Flin Flon. I've never fished northern Manitoba or Saskatchewan, but want to try something other than Ontario even though it is farther.
if its run by Kurt and his wife Juanita you will have a good time. I stayed at Kississing in september for lake trout and had a great time.Good guides good food good cabins good time!!!!!!!! billybob
